description.translate: Pleasing the child of darkness	and in his intentions, following him ...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Premio gal Môt\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Complaire à l'enfant du ténébreux\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et dans ses desseins, le suivre...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Pleasing the child of darkness\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and in his intentions, following him ...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7RES§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
